attributes.action: HANDS OFF OUR GREEN BELT LAND - WE NEED TO PROTECT IT
attributes.additional_details: We need to protect all green belt land for future generations.  Once concreted over it has gone forever.  The green belt improves our quality of life and gives us the fresh air and open countryside we need to survive.  As we have already seen,  flooding is more prevalent, as the water has nowhere to go - concrete does not soak it up.   Hands off our green belt land - stop developing on it!
